Give your family the car they deserve

The ŠKODA OCTAVIA is the ultimate car for families who demand more. Whether you’re heading for a great day out at the beach or whizzing across town to meet friends, the OCTAVIA is all about comfort with modern flair.

The Octavia should be the go-to choice for families who want a comfortable and practical hatchback.

WhatCar? Best Family Car 2018

Comfort

Go anywhere, do anything. With an expansive boot and the ability to flexibly drop seats, now it’s up to you what you pack.

Explore Features

Convenience

Designed for busy lifestyles and families on the go. The rear view camera and trailer assist make it a breeze to drive and park.

Explore Features

Infotainment

Packed with life-enhancing tech. Navigation systems get you from A to B faster while smart connectivity gives you control of music and entertainment.

Explore Features

Clever Ideas

Every detail counts. There’s no need to tidy up after the kids, with bins that clip on the doors. And be ready for anything with umbrellas, torches and ice scrapers on hand.

Explore Features

Awards

ŠKODA took home a pair of category wins at the 2018 What Car? Car of the Year Awards including the What Car? Car of the Year 2018 award for the OCTAVIA.

Explore Awards

  • Best family car

    What Car? Car of the Year 2018 awards

  • Best Estate Car

    Auto Express New Car Awards 2017

  • Best Family Car

    What Car? Car of the Year 2016 Awards
